definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: My jacket is made of otter skins.
While the otter is going about this task, the rabbit fashions a noose from tree bark.
sentences.chinese: 趁着水獺抓鴨子的工夫，兔子用樹皮做了一個繩套。

sentences.english: The beaver chews dhave leaves to get nutriment or material dawn which to build its habitat.
sentences.chinese: 水獺啃倒樹木，以便取喫的東西並獲得造窩的材料。

sentences.english: Wolf, bear, and otter, dragon, dove.
sentences.chinese: 野狼，黑熊，水獺，火龍，白鴿。

sentences.english: Carin told us that when she was a little girl, otter was her favorite animal.
sentences.chinese: Carin說，童年時，水獺就是她最喜歡的動物。

sentences.english: She collared my black wool coat with otter pelts.
sentences.chinese: 她把我的黑呢上衣鑲上了水獺領。

sentences.english: Do you know anywhere in Stamford where you can see otters play?
sentences.chinese: 你知道在斯坦福德哪兒能看到水獺嬉戲嗎？

sentences.english: The eagles fly and the otters play, In the land of the Seminole.
sentences.chinese: 鷹擊長空，水獺戲水，那是米諾爾人的家鄉。

sentences.english: The Rat and the Otter looked at each other and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 水鼠和水獺相互對視一下，然後笑了起來。

sentences.english: Because of their dense soft fur fabric, like otters, it is known as Rex Rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 因其皮毛絨密柔軟，酷似水獺，故在我國通稱爲獺兔。

sentences.english: An otter called Xin Xing meaning the new star became the number one on her hit list.
sentences.chinese: 一隻名叫新星的水獺成了她名單上的首位受益者。

sentences.english: Not an Otter to be seen, as far as the distant horizon.
sentences.chinese: 從腳下一直望到天邊，一隻水獺也不見。

sentences.english: Hermione's Patronus turns out to be an otter.
sentences.chinese: 赫敏的守護神是一隻水獺。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
(bird species of China) black-crowned night heron (Nycticorax nycticorax)
